forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Clear
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 62. North northeast wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
